name: PinballNX
description:
PinballNX is a pinball game for Windows made in C++ with SFML and Box2D. 

Controls:

Space: Start/Pause
Left, Right Shift: Flippers
Down Arrow: Plunger
Z, / : Tilt
N: New Game
M: Mute
R: Rotate Graphics
F: Enter/Exit Fullscreen
Escape: Quit

The source code is available on github.

Credits:

- SFML - Laurent Gomila and others

- Box2D - Erin Catto

- Scoreboard Font: Advanced Dot Digital-7 - Sizenko Alexander
